sentences.en: A Strategic Study on the Library CD - ROM's Long - Term Readability.
sentences.cn: 馆藏CD -ROM 长期可读的策略研究.

sentences.en: An Analysis of the Elements of the Literature Readability.
sentences.cn: 文学作品的易读性要素分析.

sentences.en: Appropriate use of habitual sayings can increase an article's readability.
sentences.cn: 惯用语用好了能够增强文章的可读性.

sentences.en: Assessing Validity of Fry's Readability Formula and Implications for English Reading Teaching.
sentences.cn: Fry文章难度测试公式的有效性及与英语阅读教学的联系.

sentences.en: Embrace brevity, but do not sacrifice readability.
sentences.cn: 拥抱简洁，但不要牺牲可读性。

sentences.en: I find that this actually increases the readability of methods: there is no chance of confusing local variables and instance variables when glancing through a method.
sentences.cn: 我认为这事实上增加了方法的可读性：即使粗略的浏览一个方法，也不会有混淆局部变量和实例变量的机会。

sentences.en: Keep It'simple! By overdoing an icon , it loses it purpose and readability.
sentences.cn: 尽量简约! 过度修饰将使原有含义偏失,使识别性变差.

sentences.en: Readability : The ease with which a passage can be read and understood.
sentences.cn: 可读性: 整段文字的容易阅读及理解的程度.

sentences.en: Readability is enhanced by improving the visual presentation of text.
sentences.cn: 可读性,是提高,改善视觉效果的文字.

sentences.en: Readability refers to how easily the developer can comprehend the source code.
sentences.cn: 可读性是指程序源代码被人理解的难易程度.

sentences.en: Readability Research of Letter Words in News Language in Our Country.
sentences.cn: 我国新闻语言中字母词的易读性研究.

sentences.en: Rectangles and lines enhance the readability of a lengthy form or report.
sentences.cn: 矩形和直线使内容较长的窗体或报表变得更加易读.

sentences.en: Symbolises: readability and stability, the hearth, home and the earth.
sentences.cn: 象征: 可读性和稳定, 壁炉 、 民政、地球.

sentences.en: System uses C language program and shown good readability and portability.
sentences.cn: 系统采用C语言编程,可读性和可移植性强.

sentences.en: The adoption of the layer structure simplified models and improved the readability.
sentences.cn: 同时层次化结构的采用简化了模型和提高了可读性.

sentences.en: The intermediate language has a good readability, generality and comprehensibility.
sentences.cn: 转换所得中间语言可读性较强, 具有通用性且易于理解.

sentences.en: This has the advantage of retaining some level of readability while making it equally clear what text has not been translated.
sentences.cn: 这样做的好处是，在同样可以指明什么文本没有翻译的同时，保持了一定程度的可读性。

sentences.en: This saves space and improves readability.
sentences.cn: 这样可以节省很多空间,并且易于阅读.

words.tran_cn: 可读的；易读的；读起来津津有味的
读者人数；读者们；读者的身分
